page.title: 15RECREATION INNERLEITHEN
page.content: There is an excellent golf course,a putting green and an active tennis club where a policeman coaches the children.Try bowling,riding,hill walking or playing chess.Fish for trout or salmon.Join the Gymnastic Club or dance with the enthusiastic Scottish Country Dancers.Guides, Brownies,Scouts and Cubs meet weekly. If musical join the Silver Band,the Pipe Band,the Opera or go to the School of Dancing. Many of us attend a Gymnastic Club. {Lisa Keddie}practises for 10 hours weekly.She is in the Scottish Squad. In Bulgaria she practised in a foam padded L-shaped gym pit.Next year 1986 she goes to France. Interest in running is keen due to tradition of{St Ronan's/}other Border Annual Games.Runners attend training sessions with coach John Motion.
